Describe the bug and environment
--------------------------------

**Smartphone (please complete the following information):**
 - Env: [e.g. Dev, Stg, Prd]
 - Device: [e.g. iPhone6]
 - OS: [e.g. iOS8.1]
 - 모바일앱 Version: [e.g. 22]

**Nutrition engine (please complete the following information):**
 - Env: [e.g. Dev, Stg, Prd]
 - 펌웨어 Version: [e.g. 22]
 - 디바이스앱 Version: [e.g. 22]

2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
